name: Classic Spaghetti Bolognese
instructions: 1. Brown meat in large pot. 2. Add onions and garlic, sauté until soft. 3. Add tomatoes and herbs. 4. Simmer for 1 hour. 5. Cook pasta separately. 6. Combine and serve with parmesan.

name: Chicken Stir-Fry
instructions: 1. Slice chicken and vegetables. 2. Heat wok with oil. 3. Stir-fry chicken until cooked. 4. Add vegetables. 5. Add sauce and combine. 6. Serve over rice.

name: Vegetable Soup
instructions: 1. Chop all vegetables. 2. Sauté onions and garlic. 3. Add vegetables and broth. 4. Simmer until vegetables are tender. 5. Season and serve.

name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
instructions: 1. Cream butter and sugar. 2. Add eggs and vanilla. 3. Mix in dry ingredients. 4. Add chocolate chips. 5. Bake at 180°C for 12 minutes.

name: Greek Salad
instructions: 1. Chop vegetables. 2. Combine in bowl. 3. Add feta cheese. 4. Drizzle with olive oil and oregano. 5. Toss and serve.

name: Fish Tacos
instructions: 1. Season fish. 2. Grill until cooked. 3. Warm tortillas. 4. Prepare toppings. 5. Assemble tacos. 6. Serve with lime.

name: Mushroom Risotto
instructions: 1. Sauté mushrooms. 2. Cook onions in butter. 3. Add rice and wine. 4. Gradually add hot broth. 5. Finish with parmesan.

name: Berry Smoothie
instructions: 1. Add berries and yogurt to blender. 2. Add honey and milk. 3. Blend until smooth. 4. Serve immediately.

name: Beef Burger
instructions: 1. Mix beef with seasonings. 2. Form patties. 3. Grill to desired doneness. 4. Toast buns. 5. Assemble with toppings.

name: Banana Bread
instructions: 1. Mash bananas. 2. Mix wet ingredients. 3. Combine with dry ingredients. 4. Pour into loaf pan. 5. Bake at 160°C for 1 hour.
